summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Chapter 23.49 of the Seattle Municipal Code to incorporate updated and corrected maps, revise provisions for street level use requirements and tower width limits, provide for tower spacing in DMC zones south of Union Street, and revise requirements for provision of lighting; amending Section 23.41.012 to limit the scope of Design Review departures from Land Use Code requirements; clarifying provisions for the location of parking and access to parking in 23.49.019; amending Chapters 23.76 and 23.84 to repeal provisions made obsolete by Ordinance 122054; amending Section 23.45.008 to clarify the effect of changes in definitions on special provisions for low-income housing; removing an obsolete reference from the Downtown Amenity Standards; and making technical corrections.
